ticket.title: 3.0.3 - NoMethodError: undefined method `to_tempfile' for #<ActionDispatch::Http::UploadedFile:0x2b9161fb8470>

version.title: 3.0.3 - NoMethodError: undefined method `to_tempfile' for #<ActionDispatch::Http::UploadedFile:0x2b9161fb8470>

version.body:
Paperclip must be upgraded to work:
https://github.com/thoughtbot/paperclip/commit/ef7233d25700a7e69cebd2334b656fa9ca0ae927
Hope that helps!

https://github.com/thoughtbot/paperclip/commit/ef7233d25700a7e69ceb...

Hope that helps!
